name: PUMPKIN Man's Revenge
description:
A simple HORROR game made by one of the members of MuteMayhem.

This game was made in 3 days, so there will be some bugs or bad functionality.

This game is quite short.

--------------------=+=-------------------

Pumpkin man's revenge is a game where you need to escape a building where the pumpkin man will chase you till death.

find the clues to escape!
